## `SetGraphCommonImage`

Sets the common image\index{Images!bar backgrounds} drawn across all bars.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetGraphCommonImage(string imagePath)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|`string` imagePath | The path to the image. |

::: {.callout-note}
The [`BoxEffect.CommonImage`](#boxeffect) effect will need to be enabled for either box plots or bar charts for this to have any effect.
:::

### Example {-}

``` {.lua}
codeProject = StandardProject(Application.GetUserPath(UserPath.Documents) ..
                              "Coding Guidelins.docx")
codeProject:SetGraphCommonImage(Application.GetUserPath(UserPath.Pictures) ..
                                "IMG_0131.JPG")
codeProject:SetBarChartBarEffect(BoxEffect.CommonImage)
```
